member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetGuidProperty(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to a Guid. Checks the byte count for a length greater than 16 bytes.
For use with the PtypGuid (0x0048) property type

member.remarks: Use GetMultipleGuidProperty if you're working with a property that contains more than 1 Guid.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetTimeProperty(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to a DateTime Structure.
For use with the PtypTime (0x0040) property type

member.remarks:
Use GetMultipleTimeProperty if you're working with a property that is an array of unicode strings.
This should not be confused with . This function uses data stored in UTC time, whereas GetFloatingTimeProperty stores it in a non-compatible floating point value.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetEncodedStringProperty(System.Byte[],System.Text.Encoding)

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to a string with the specified encoding.
For use with the PtypString8 (0x001E) property type

member.remarks: Use GetMultipleEncodedStringProperty if you're working with a property that is an array of strings encoded wiht a specified encoding.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data
The encoding of the string to conver the bytes to

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetUnicodeStringProperty(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to a unicode string.
For use with the PtypString (0x001F) property type

member.remarks: Use GetMultipleUnicodeStringProperty if you're working with a property that is an array of unicode strings.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetInt64Property(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to a Int64. Checks the byte count for a length greater than 8 bytes.
For use with the PtypInteger64 (0x0014) property type

member.remarks: Use GetMultipleInt64Property if you're working with a property that contains more than 1 Int64.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetFloatingTimeProperty(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to a DateTime. Checks the byte count for a length greater than 8 bytes.
For use with the PtypFloatingTime (0x0007) property type

member.remarks:
Use GetMultipleFloatingTimeProperty if you're working with a property that contains more than 1 DateTime. This property is stored as a Double, representing the number of days since December 30, 1899, the fractional part representing a fraction of a day since midnight.
This should not be confused with . GetTimeProperty stores it in UTC format and is not compatible with this function.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetDoubleProperty(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to an float64 (Double). Checks the byte count for a length greater than 8 bytes.
For use with the PtypFloating64 (0x0005) or PtypCurrency (0x0006) property type.

remarks.para: Use GetMultipleDoubleProperty if you're working with a property that contains more than 1 float64.

.Net has no public Currency type. However, the definition of the property type PtypCurrency shows it's a [MS-DTYP] of LONGLONG or [MS-OAUT] of currency defined as an 8 byte representation of a decimal value. The .Net framework's decimal value is a 128-bit type, so a Double was chosen as the closest replacement.

member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetFloatProperty(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to an float32 (Single). Checks the byte count for a length greater than 4 bytes.
For use with the PtypFloating32 (0x0004) property type.

member.remarks: Use GetMultipleFloatProperty if you're working with a property that contains more than 1 float32.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetInt32Property(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to an Int32. Checks the byte count for a length greater than 4 bytes.
For use with the PtypInteger32 (0x0003) or PtypErrorCode (0x000A) property types

member.remarks: Use GetMultipleInt32Property if you're working with a property that contains more than 1 Int32.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data

member.name: M:pstsdk.mcpp.util.prop.PropertyHelper.GetInt16Property(System.Byte[])

summary.para: Converts an array of bytes to an Int16. Checks the byte count for a length greater than 2 bytes.
For use with the PtypInteger16 (0x0002) property type

member.remarks: Use GetMultipleInt16Property if you're working with a property that contains more than 1 Int16.
member.param: array of bytes representing property data
